thread.title: Beyonce’s Pregnancy Announcement Now the Most-Liked Instagram Post, Dethrones Selena Gomez
thread.title_full: Beyonce’s Pregnancy Announcement Now the Most-Liked Instagram Post, Dethrones Selena Gomez

title: Beyonce’s Pregnancy Announcement Now the Most-Liked Instagram Post, Dethrones Selena Gomez

organizations.name: biggest social media fails courtesy of beyonce/instagram

text:
PHOTOS: Celebrities’ Biggest Social Media Fails Courtesy of Beyonce/Instagram 
As previously reported, Beyoncé, 35, surprised fans when she announced that she and husband Jay Z are expecting twins later this year. A photo posted by Selena Gomez (@selenagomez) on Jun 25, 2016 at 2:03pm PDT 
“We would like to share our love and happiness. We have been blessed two times over. We are incredibly grateful that our family will be growing by two, and we thank you for your well wishes. - The Carters,” the 20-time Grammy winner captioned a serene shot of herself baring her pregnant belly while kneeling before a floral arrangement. Beyonce and Jay-Z on November 4, 2016 in Cleveland, Ohio. Duane Prokop/Getty Images 
The Lemonade singer’s announcement comes ahead of her performance at the 2017 Grammy awards on February 12. 
"She announced it this way before Grammy fittings and rehearsals, as she knew it would get out," an insider told Us Weekly . "She couldn't repeat the same debut on the show like the [2011] VMAs and didn't want it to take away from her Grammy wins and performance." As fans well remember, Beyoncé confirmed her first pregnancy with daughter Blue Ivy by debuting her baby bump at the awards show in 2011. You May Also Like
